item.title: Ã˜MQ Quiz #1
item.author: mail@richardmillen.com (Richard Millen)
item.description: This quiz is based on the ZeroMQ Guide written by Pieter Hintjens. 1 Give an example of load balancing. Show Answer The ventilator uses a PUSH socket to evenly distribute tasks to workers. function showAnswer(divId) { var x = document.getElementById(divId); if (x.style.display === 'none') { x.style.display = 'block'; } else { x.style.display = 'none'; } } 2 Give an example of fair queuing.
